The CILM experience has been invaluable - having the opportunity to work as a team to plan, implement, assess, and reflect upon student learning   Next year, it would be beneficial to spend more time learning about how to develop conceptual understanding in students with special needs who are a part of the regular classroom program - how is it possible to reach ALL of our kids in the limited time we have with them.
